entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
